A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What's to like in this movie? 
(1) All important questions remain unanswered.
(2) Luke tossing the light saber\, really?
(3) Rey is a nobody\, huh?
(4) Snoke is gone\, and who was the guy?
(5) Can a bad guy being more lame than Kylo Ren? Just a kid with a tantrum.
(6) So Luke spent 20+ yrs\, drinking green milk huh ... What else?

Its so lame\, that a main character like Luke\, just vanishes after 40 years without giving a simple answer.

So badly written\, the story is so shallow.

If they would have respected the many stories about the twins of Leia and Han (Jacen and Jaina)\, or just introduce Mara Jade in the plot ... Anyway\, almost anything would have been better than this shallow story\, with no apparent meaning ...
Just sad ...
